QuestData.Title: The Healing of Shen-zin Su
QuestData.Description: This is more horrific than I imagined, but we can handle this. We need to gather the healers and close the wound. We need to save Shen-zin Su.$B$BFind any healers you can! Rescue them, relieve them - whatever you need to do to get them over here healing the wound.$B$BKeep the healers safe at all costs!
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue and defend healers until Shen-zin Su's wound is healed.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need to get the healers to the wound and keep them safe!
QuestData.RewardText: You are a sight to see when under pressure, $n! We wouldn't have stood a chance without you.$B$BI think it's working. The flow of blood is slowing. I knew it would work!
